message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. This product is worth at least $1500000 to me, and I'm confident it will be incredibly valuable for your business. I'm offering it to you for $2000000. This is a competitive price, but I'm open to discussing it further if you have any questions or counteroffers.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. However, given my current budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $2000000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While $1500000 is my absolute minimum, I'm willing to be flexible.  To show my commitment to this deal, I'll lower my price to $1750000. This still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's a fair price considering the potential value of this product to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to be flexible, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1600000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and allows us to move forward with this transaction.
